data.title: boos and beers
data.text: My boyfriend and i had a great time!! The weather was awesome and Will was so knowledgeable about the city!! We would for sure do it again!

data.title: Great fun!
data.text: My husband, daughter and her friend and I had a great time on the Boos and Brews Columbus tour.  It was fascinating and very well-planned. Great beverage stops too! Will was funny and quite well-versed on Cbus history.

data.title: Boos and Beers Tour - Halloween with ShowMeColumbus
data.text:
This was fun and interesting - how many tours are packed with history and let you drink along the way?  The tour included stops at 4 bars, 2 of which we got to sit down, have a drink, and listen to stories (we stood at the first and last stops).  Will knows his history and locations, and kept things moving.  There was just the right amount of walking, plus we took the free CBus for the longest distance.  

My friends and I live in the Columbus area, and we learned a lot.  We all agreed we would like to do a future tour with Will.

data.title: Really fun experience
data.text: This tour was fun, and informative. I learned a lot about the history of Columbus while enjoying a few beers at places I have always wanted to go. It was a break from the usual and the people and tour guide were so much fun.

data.title: Loads of fun!
data.text: So many interesting stories and places in Columbus!  We all had a great time!  Got to see many places in downtown that we don't normally visit.

data.title: So Much to See and Do in Columbus!!!!
data.text: This was Great!!!!!!!!! So many things after living my whole life here that I didn't know WOW!!! Lots of Fun and found out about some SPIRITS along the way!!!!

data.title: Amazing tour for Boozing Birthday Group!!
data.text:
I honestly would give this an 11 out of 10 if I could. I had tried a few places to book a tour for my husbands birthday (in March but I made it for May, better weather supposedly. haha). We had a group that kept changing from 10 people to 18 to 13. For a 2-3 hr tour with a huge group it ended up being like $23-$25 per person which is Very reasonable. Will was the only tour group that was willing to REALLY work with me and make the tour whatever I wanted it to be. We asked for the haunted tour and it made it happen, we had to make a few adjustments due to our big group but it worked out beautifully. He really does his research, and even though it's kind of a creepy/scary/sad tour, (ghost stories and crazy deaths, seriously crazy you have to do this tour) Will keeps it fun and has a lot of lil jokes to keep it going. 

We had people coming from all over the state and basically said whatever I can do so that you guys have fun, I'll make it happen. We already know we're doing more tours with him in the future. Such a nice guy, gave great recommendations for food and cool bars to hang out if you're not from Columbus, and even though a few of us have lived there for 5-10 years, we ALL learned a lot of new crazy things. 

Honestly, get a group of friends, or family or anyone who likes to see the city and just have some fun, and do this tour, or any of Wills tours, nicest guy and just a really good tour guide.

data.title: Great experience!
data.text: I was looking for something different to do while visiting family in Ohio and thought we'd give this a try. As a tourist to Columbus it was interesting and my family who lived there really enjoyed it too. We did a private tour with Will as we were open for anything and I think he had as much fun as we did.Will is very knowledgeable on the history of Columbus and has great stories to tell. We learned a lot, had a blast, and would highly recommend this tour to anyone looking for something different to do!

data.title: Great tour
data.text: We've lived in Columbus for over a year, but this tour made us look at this city differently.  Loved learning more about the city's history and hauntings.  Would recommend this tour to visitors and locals.

data.title: Ghosts, Time Travel, History & More!
data.text: Just did the Boos and Beers Tour with Will last night.  It was a ton of fun.  He does a great job telling the history and stories in the area.  If you're looking for an excellent, often unknown, past of Columbus, ShowMeColumbus is great!  I've lived here all my life and there's so much that I didn't know! Definitely check it out!

data.title: Spooky humor *executed* with humor!
data.text: We took part in the Boos & Beers haunted tour along a route featuring bars in Downtown Columbus and Arena District. Will was so well-researched, with an iPad ready to show us photos along the tour. We visited several neat spots along the way, and Will's oratory skills made each story come alive. He was accommodating, well-prepared, and so fun to tag along with. Thank you!

data.title: Well-researched history of Columbus
data.text: Will was incredibly enthusiastic throughout the Boos & Beers tour. He gave a thorough background of major Columbus events through the lens of "What could make Columbus haunted?"

data.title: Columbus came alive!
data.text: While I was visiting family in Columbus, we went on a tour with Will. He knew so much about the city's past, and really made the history come alive with his colorful stories. Will's tour was interesting and enjoyable, and we never felt rushed.

data.title: A really fun Columbus experience
data.text: Will took my family and I on a fantastic tour of the Short North, Arena District and Victorian Village. He was enthusiastic and knowledgeable. We learned more than I imagined about Columbus and saw some beautiful homes / buildings as well. It was nice to see such popular areas come alive in a different way. We were talking about what Will taught us even the day after the tour, because it was that memorable. It rained during our tour but that did not diminish the fun in this event. Will also made sure that there were bathroom breaks as needed and the tour would be great for all ages, including seniors.

data.title: Believer or not!
data.text: My family was in Columbus for a very short time. We booked a ghost/history tour with Will.  I had several personal difficulties, such as a delayed flight and changing tour participants, but Will was very accommodating throughout it all.  The tour captured everyone's interest from those who are true believers in ghosts to the skeptics.

data.title: Tours of Columbus
data.text: Will has been very attentive to the needs of our guests and changes his tour based on their specific interests. They always have an enjoyable time and go away learning new and interesting things about our great city!

data.title: Will's tours deliver both fun and education
data.text:
If you are interested in exploring the ins and outs of Columbus, take a ShowMeColumbus tour. It's perfect for visitors and Ohio natives alike. Personally I live in Columbus and continually seek to learn more about this fascinating city. 

Will, the tour guide and visionary behind ShowMeColumbus, is both enthusiastic and confident in his knowledge of Ohio, especially Columbus. He knows everything from the historical significance of the Union Station Arch in the Arena District to the hottest new restaurant opening in the Short North. I've taken several of Will's tours and always learn something new about my favorite city. He personalizes tours based on individual interests -- anything from the haunted history of Columbus to campus visits to The Ohio State University. His tours are never recycled, instead, Will customizes directly to each visitor. Just tell him what you are looking for and he will take good care of you. 

Protip: Will's tours often involve walking. I love being active outdoors so walking a mile or two doesn't phase me. If mobility is a concern, contact Will -- he definitely will accommodate.
